channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
hi ive got a PI source and its a pvp server. I like it but i wanna change something:
-When i kill someone i get a random drop they still lose their shit but i get a random shity drop. I know there are artifacts but how do i make it so i get their drop and the artifacts.
-also for some reason i cannot go nowhere except for ardoughno (pvp place) and the home how can i change this?

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:366194”][quote author=Fusion Realm © link=topic=462397.msg3382628#msg3382628 date=1288175659]
hmm what base are you using? and what version is it?
[/quote]
…

hi ive got a PI source and its a pvp server. I like it but i wanna change something:

-When i kill someone i get a random drop they still lose their shit but i get a random shity drop. I know there are artifacts but how do i make it so i get their drop and the artifacts.

-also for some reason i cannot go nowhere except for ardoughno (pvp place) and the home how can i change this?

You have to add the item id’s to the monster that is being attacked. Therefore adding ‘NPCDROPS’ to the NPC which are located in NPCDROPS.TSM I believe the extension is called.

Assuming it was a PVP source; you have to add the rest of the Teleports to it. You are going to want to add the cords for them which is located in Config.Java.[/quote]

… He was asking about pvp drops not npc drops

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Fusion Realm ©:

hmm what base are you using? and what version is it?

…

[quote=“paymon, post:1, topic:366194”]hi ive got a PI source and its a pvp server. I like it but i wanna change something:

-When i kill someone i get a random drop they still lose their shit but i get a random shity drop. I know there are artifacts but how do i make it so i get their drop and the artifacts.

-also for some reason i cannot go nowhere except for ardoughno (pvp place) and the home how can i change this?[/quote]
You have to add the item id’s to the monster that is being attacked. Therefore adding ‘NPCDROPS’ to the NPC which are located in NPCDROPS.TSM I believe the extension is called.

Assuming it was a PVP source; you have to add the rest of the Teleports to it. You are going to want to add the cords for them which is located in Config.Java.

Read full topic

hmm what base are you using? and what version is it?
